bibl.title: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, January 29, 1924

div1.p: Read sends Pothier's final report on the work of the Yellow Fever Commission that went to Colombia in 1923.

div1.head: Letter from Florence M. Read to Henry Rose Carter, January 29, 1924

January 29, 1924
Dear Doctor Carter:
div1.p:
You will find enclosed a copy of Doctor Pothier's
final report enc. 1; enc. 2 to Doctor White of his share in the work of the
Commission which went to Colombia in April, 1923, to inves-
tigate yellow fever conditions.
div1.closer:
Very sincerely yours, Florence M. Read Doctor H. R. Carter
2121 California St., N.W.
Washington, D.C.
